full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/27/2023 TED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No. 43-R423 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT (ANSWER ALL ITEMS; FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) I. GURCHARN SINGH JOLLY . residing at 1966 LOS ALAMITOS DRIVE (Name) (Street and number) PLACENTIA CA 92670 USA (City) (State) (ZIP Code, v in U.S.) (Country) being duly sworn depose and say: 1. I was born on 6.3.1939 at CHAKWAL PAKISTAN Also, answer either a, b or c. as appro- (Date) (City) (Country) priate, if you are not a native born United States citizen. Naturalized on Nov15,1985 (a) If a United States citizen through naturalization, give number of certificate of naturalization at Los Angeles (b) If a United States citizen through parent(s) marriage, give 12266722 or number of own certificate of citizenship Certificate# 12266722 If nona obtained. attach statement explaining how citizenship derived. (c) If as alica lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence. give "A" INSTITUTE 2. That I am 48 years of age and have resided in the United States since Nov. 24th, 1979 3. That this affidavit is executed in behalf of the following person(s) at present residing at LUDHIANA-INDIA - COUNTRY MARRIED OR RELATIONSHIP TO NAME SEX AGE OF BIRTH SINGLE DEPONENT 1. INDER SINGH M 73 PAKISTAN M FATHER 2.HARBANS KAUR F 69 PAKISTAN M MOTHER 4. (Amounts shown in answer to this question must be in United States dollars.) (a) That I am employed as, or engaged in the business of Marketing Manager with Westland Computers, INC. (Name of concern) 2110E 1st St #105 Santa Ana, and CA92705 derive a net annual income of $ 30,000 (b) That I have on deposit in savings at (Address) banks in this country $ 39000 (c) That I have other personal property, the reasonable value of which is $ 19000 (d) That I have stocks and bonds in the amount of $ NIL . market value, as indicated on attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (c) That I own real estate at 1966 LOS Alamitos DR. PLACENTIA valued at $ 1,90,000 with mortgages or other encumbrances there- on amounting to $1,40,000 (f) That I have life insurance in the sum of $ NIL . cash surrender value. of $ AIIL (g) That if self-employed, I attach a copy of my last income tax return or report of commer- cial rating concern which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (See instructions for nature of evidence of net worth to be submitted) 5. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place a check in the appropriate column to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.) WHOLLY PARTIALLY NAME OF PERSON DEPENDENT DEPENDENT AGE RELATIONSHIP TO ME FOIA (b)(6) Form I-134 (Rev. 3-1-76) N
